mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(property_id) FROM f_cost_rule_room where cost_rule_id = #{ruleId} and property_type='room'
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(property_id) FROM f_cost_rule_room where cost_rule_id = #{ruleId} and property_type='park'

select aa.*,dd.name commName,cc.name commAreaName,bb.id ids from r_parking_space aa, f_cost_rule_room bb ,r_comm_area cc,r_community dd where aa.id = bb.property_id and aa.comm_area_id=cc.id and aa.comm_id = dd.id and bb.property_type='park' and bb.cost_rule_id=#{ruleId} and aa.is_delete=0
